p: A 500 μL pipette of C 7–C 40 n-alkane saturated alkane mixture was placed into a 10 mL volumetric flask and diluted to the volume with n-hexane to make a concentration of 50 μL/mL solution. Then, 3 mL of alkane solution was transferred to a 20 mL headspace vial for SHS-GC-MS analysis. The SHS-GC-MS conditions were the same as that in Section 2.4. The sample was analyzed in triplicate.
